english.segment1: I can't stay here anymore. There's no time for me to hideaway. Waste another day. But you oh Lord I can't ignore. Or the chance to know that I can change. Before it's too late
english.segment2: Here and now-I lay it all down. I take the road that leads to you. I won't look back, I won't turn around. I give myself away to you. Here and now-I lay it all down. I give myself away to you today
english.segment3: It's a mystery to me. How I'm tempted by the lies that shine. Make me blind. I try to run-try to flee. From the sin that's had me hypnotized. I've realized
english.segment4: Here and now-I lay it all down. I take the road that leads to you. I won't look back, I won't turn around. I give myself away to you. Here and now-I lay it all down. I give myself away to you today
english.segment5: I can't stay here anymore. There's no time for me to hideaway
english.segment6: Here and now-I lay it all down. I take the road that leads to you. I won't look back, I won't turn around. I give myself away to you. Here and now-I lay it all down. I give myself away to you today
english.segment8: I give myself away. I give myself away. I give myself away
